### new item

``` {r}
gvalue <- 40
gauge(gvalue, min=0, max=100, 
      symbol = "Points", 
      gaugeSectors(success = c(80,100),
                   warning = c(51,79), 
                   danger = c(0,50)
                   )
      )
```
